name: GR8 ATRAKT0R
description:
This is a prototype made for ScoreSpace Jam #18. 

Energy runs out with time. When reaches 0 - it's game over!

Make magnetic chains with more than 3 balls of single color to gain score and energy.

Attract with Left Mouse Button and Repel - with Right Mouse Button

2nd May 2022

by

Gameplay : Tribar

Music : Soulless
